ovdesc.p: IS.PARAMETER is the parameter table to define the Islamic Banking product related features.

desc.p: The transaction type condition for down payment.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION.
The Category to refer Goods In Transit Account. During Approval, the account formed out of this category will be used as Goods In Transit Account for Accounting.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid T24 Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
2. Mandatory Input if one of the workflow status is "APPROVAL"
The ID of the table IS.PARAMETER is a numeric value from 1-999. These are Islamic Products defined for the Islamic Transactions.
The percentage of the document amount to be defaulted for Finance.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid percentage (less than 100).
Category to refer Liability Transfer Account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
Category to refer Multi supplier Account. This is the Vendor Wash account used in the Contract during Purchase. Vendor Payments are disbursed from this account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
2. Mandatory Input if one of the workflow status is "PURCHASE".
The Musharaka Parameter key which defines the Musharaka features of the product.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid key from IS.MUSH.PARAM.
2. Mandatory input if the PRODUCT.TYPE is 'Musharaka'.
Category to refer Outright Sale Account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
Contains all the override messages which the user has confirmed during input.

During Commit, the system may generate a series of screen override messages waiting for User Approval. If the record is subsequently displayed or printed, all override messages are shown in this field.
Validation Rules:
System generated. Multi-value field.
Transaction code that will be used while raising Pre-Approval entries.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table TRANSACTION.
2. Mandatory Input if one of the workflow status is "APPROVAL"
Identifies the AA products that the Islamic product could support for Finance/Deposits.
Validation Rules:
1. Must be a valid key of AA.PRODUCT.
2. Mandatory Input.
Based on the unique features of the specified business the product types are classified. The value like Musharaka will enable Musharaka Contribution Features in the Product.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Values are Musharaka, Tawaruq, Taqseet
Category to refer Purchase Account. During Purchase, the account formed out of this category will be used as Purchase Account for Accounting.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
2. Mandatory Input if one of the workflow status is "PURCHASE".
Category to refer Purchase Order Account. During Approval, the account formed out of this category will be used as Purchase Order Account for Accounting.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
2. Mandatory Input if one of the workflow status is "APPROVAL"
Transaction code that will be used while raising Purchase entries.
Validation Rules:
1. valid record from the table TRANSACTION
2. Mandatory Input if one of the workflow status is "PURCHASE".
The category that will be used to refer Repossess Account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
The Transaction code that will be used while raising Repossess entries.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table TRANSACTION.
The PL category to which the resale loss has to be accounted.
When the bank makes a loss on account of selling the defaulted goods in the open market, such loss is debited from the internal a/c.
This may either recover the loss or write-off in profit/loss account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid PL Category ranging from 50000 to 69999.
The Transaction code that will be used while raising Resale entries that results in Loss.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table TRANSACTION.
The PL category to which the resale profit has to be accounted.

After the purchase of the commodity for the purpose of leasing, if the customer backs out of his promise to lease the same, the bank will make a resale in open market and such profit is accounted in this P/L category.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid PL Category ranging from 50000 to 69999.
The Transaction code that will be used while raising Resale entries that gains profit.
Validation Rules:
1. valid record from the table TRANSACTION.
The company for which the related asset is restricted.
Validation Rules:
1. Must be a valid company or a value "ALL".
The assets or commodity that is restricted to transact using this product.
Validation Rules:
1. Must be a valid key of IS.COMMODITY.
This field is used to specify the cost types that are to be restricted during purchase.
Validation Rules:
1. Must be a valid IS.COST.TYPES.
Category to refer Retention Account. The retention amount will be withheld in this account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
The percentage of the Vendor payment to be retained from paying.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid percentage (less than 100).
Category to refer Bank Cash Account during Asset Review
Validation Rules:
1. Valid Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
The Auto conversion of Simulation Finance(AA) contracts to live arrangement to be enabled is specified in this field.
Specifies the list of Statuses in the sequential order which may form a workflow for the product.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid values like Request, Approval, etc. are defined in the EB.LOOKUP table with prefix "IS.WF.STATUS*".
Currently, supported statuses are Request, Approval, Purchase, Resale, Delivery.
Validation Rules:
1. Must be a EB.LOOKUP options with a prefix IS.WF.STATUS*
The transaction type condition for External Vendor Payments(NOSTRO).
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION.
The transaction type condition for Vendor Payments.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION.
The Down Payment contribution by the customer can be provided as "Cash" or "Supplier". The field CONTRIB.BY.ASSET specifies if the customer down payment contribution could be provided as "Asset".
The transaction type condition for External Additional Cost Payments(NOSTRO).
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION.
The transaction type condition for Additional Cost Payments.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION.
The transaction code to be referenced while raising accounting entries for additional cost.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid record from the table TRANSACTION
The number of decimals the asset unit price can be accepted.
Validation Rules:
1. Any value from 0 to 10
Description about the Islamic Product.
Validation Rules:
1. Standard T24 Alphanumeric field.
2. Mandatory Input.
Category for Down Payment Customer Account.
Validation Rules:
1. Valid T24 Internal category ranging from 10000 to 19999.
